quotes.quote: THE WINNER, BY TOTAL ANNIHILATION... YAMA!
Who's next?! Who has the guts to step into the ring with Little Yama?!
I have a robot. I built it myself.

scene: Tadashi just saved Hiro who was at a Bot Fight.

quotes.quote: Bot Fighting is illegal. You're going to get yourself arrested!
Bot Fighting is NOT illegal! Betting on Bot Fighting, that's-- that's illegal. But, SO lucrative!
I'm on a roll, big brother! AND THERE IS NO STOPPING ME!
